summary: New robes for necro type chars
descriptionHtml:
Simple retex of the the Nocturnal Robe (Hoodless version) and Morokei mask
to more closely match a necromancer/dark magic character.

It requires some replacer to make whatever robe or outfit you want to wear
to be replaced with the Nocturnal robe. I use the replacer for the the
Arch Mage robe personally. Its important that its a hoodless version or
your char might not have a head/hair.

Since this replaces the texture for the Morokei HOOD all the other dragon
priest hoods will be replaced too if theyre the same brown texture.

Just drop these files in your Skyrim\\Data Folder and off you go!
author: Aridale Noblebrook Belmont
